content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's my pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, what do you think a fair price for this prime location would be?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm a student, and I'm looking for a place that's not only close to the city center but also offers good value for money. I'm smart and responsible, and I'm not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards, and I'd like to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. With that in mind, I would be willing to pay 600 Euro per month for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 600 Euro is not nearly enough for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm looking for a price that reflects the high demand for such a prime location. How about we start at 900 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of the apartment, but as a student, I have a limited budget. 900 Euro per month is quite high for me. I'm looking for a more student-friendly price. How about 700 Euro per month? I think that would be a fair compromise.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 700 Euro is still below the market value for this area. I'm looking for a price that reflects the investment I've made in this property. Let's try 850 Euro per month. It's a significant sum, but I believe it's justified by the location and the amenities. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your perspective, but as a student, I'm really looking for something that won't strain my finances. 850 Euro per month is still quite a bit for me. I'd like to propose 750 Euro per month. This would allow me to live comfortably without overspending. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 750 Euro is still not enough for the value this apartment offers. It's a brand-new building with all the modern conveniences, and it's in the heart of the city. I'm willing to go down to 825 Euro per month, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet this price, then I'm sorry, but I'll have to look for a tenant who values the quality and location of this apartment more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your final offer of 825 Euro per month. It's still quite high for me, but I understand the value of the apartment. As a student, I'm trying to balance quality with affordability. I'm willing to accept your price of 825 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 825 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. You've made a wise decision. This apartment will provide you with a comfortable living experience in the heart of the city. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Let's proceed with the paperwork, and I'll make sure everything is in order. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
